its current workers are located. In a speech Tuesday, Eric Schmidt said Google Inc. will hire more than 1,000 workers in Europe this year. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice-president of engineering and research. A year after the war, Saddam Hussein mocked President Bush from Baghdad and claimed victory:` It was George H.W. Bush with his own will who decided to stop the fighting. Nobody had asked him to do so.' Seizing on that appearance of presidential weakness, Bill Clinton campaigned that year against President Bush - and beat him- chiding George H.W. Bush for not putting Saddam Hussein and his acolytes on trial for war crimes.`` Bill Clinton would prove no more effective than George H.W. Bush in removing Saddam Hussein , Geoffrey Wawro noted.`` Perhaps Colin Powell said it best, in his post-war memoirs, when he compared the pressures weighing on George H.W.
